audio is not in sync :(

audio sync is 4000ms = 4sec.

just open the video in mplayer classic (google for the freeware player: "media player home cinema") and set up in options:

Internal Filter -> delay (ms) 4000

for this video.
For other videos just disable the checkbox :)

Happy watching a sync video.

To make this smackdown sync, just delay exact 4000ms the audiostream (in some players settings)

And dont forget to set it back after watching :)

for lag audio :
1 - play it in media playe classic
2- right click on the screen play 
3- chose audio the option
4- @ audio time shift ( activate it if it dose not)
5- make the number (-4100 or -4200 )
not : dont forget the  "   -  "  before the numbers .
